mapper.insert: insert into message (title, content, user_id, receiver_id) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{userID}, #{receiverID})
mapper.select: select megNum, title, content, send_date AS sendDate, read_check AS readCheck, user_id AS userID, receiver_id AS receiverID from message where megNum = #{megNum}
select megNum, title, content, send_date AS sendDate, read_check AS readCheck, user_id AS userID, receiver_id AS receiverID from message where megNum > 0 order by megNum desc, send_date desc

select megNum, title, content, send_date AS sendDate, read_check AS readCheck, user_id AS userID, receiver_id AS receiverID from message where megNum > 0 order by megNum desc, sendDate desc limit #{page}, 10

select megNum, title, content, send_date AS sendDate, read_check AS readCheck, user_id AS userID, receiver_id AS receiverID from message where megNum > 0 order by megNum desc, sendDate desc limit #{page}, #{perPageNum}
select count(megNum) from message where megNum > 0

select megNum, title, content, send_date AS sendDate, read_check AS readCheck, user_id AS userID, receiver_id AS receiverID from message where megNum > 0 AND receiver_id = #{userID} order by megNum desc, sendDate desc limit #{page}, 10

select megNum, title, content, send_date AS sendDate, read_check AS readCheck, user_id AS userID, receiver_id AS receiverID from message where megNum > 0 AND user_id = #{userID} order by megNum desc, sendDate desc limit #{page}, 10
